name: Klaus (Fan Game)
description:
This fan game inspired in Klaus - Movie

Pixel Art,  Animation and Songs : Sunrei

Tiles and Scenery Components: Danigod

Programming: Ninja

Commands: Espace = Jump

Choise between keys  : UpArrow , DownArrow , LeftArrow, RightArrow  for give the gift

Collect Ten cards for a special gift
